de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.particity.portlet.user.registration

Class RegistrationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.particity.portlet.BaseController

  • @Controller(value="adminController")
 @RequestMapping(value="view")
public class RegistrationController
extends BaseController
    Controller for the newsletter registration form Redirects to user/register by default
